title: Drawing, Sketchbook Page: Six Scenes; Verso: Five Studies of Horse Heads; Head of Lion, 1811–14
title_raw: Sketchbook Page: Six Scenes; Verso: Five Studies of Horse Heads; Head of Lion
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 145, 82, Pelegrino Tibaldi Ancona, Raffaello Pesaro, Raffaello Loreto, Polidoro da Caravaggio Roma, Andrea del Sarto Firenze, Polidoro Roma.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Triumph of Bacchus and Arianna; Madonna with female figure; Madonna and infant with St. Anna, St. Elizabeth; Bacchic representation; Sacred Family with St. John. Verso: five studies of horse heads; lion head.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Sketchbook Page: Six Scenes; Verso: Five Studies of Horse Heads; Head of Lion, 1811–14. Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2452
